feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: I shall never speak to you about anything again. I'm very sorry for all the trouble I've caused—that's all.

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: Fred secretly felt that his future was guaranteed against the fulfilment of Mary’s sarcastic prophecies.

feels.name: Pity
feels.quote: Her pity for him surmounted her anger and all her other anxieties.

feels.name: Resentment
feels.quote: How can you bear to be so contemptible, when others are working and striving, and there are so many things to be done?

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: I consider my father and mother the best part of myself, sir.

feels.name: Tenderness
feels.quote: Caleb's voice became more tender; he had been pushing his hat about on the table and looking at it, but finally he turned his eyes on his daughter.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: I’ve been a bit of a fool again, and put my name to a bill, and now it comes to paying.

Places.name: Mary_s_house
Places.description: The setting for emotional conversations and revelations between the characters.
